00028 glslShader::glslShader(const std::string &filename, GLenum shaderType = GL_VERTEX_SHADER)
00029 {
00030         glGetError();//clear error messages
00031         handle = glCreateShader(shaderType);
00032         
00033         fstream file;
00034         file.open(filename.c_str(), ios::in);//open file for input
00035         
00036         if(!file.is_open())//if that doesn't work
00037         {
00038                 std::clog<<"couldn't open shader\n";
00039                 return;//return our shame
00040         }
00041         
00042         GLuint count =0;
00043         
00044         file.seekg(0, ios::end);
00045         count = file.tellg();
00046         file.seekg(0, ios::beg);
00047 
00048         GLchar* shaderCode = (GLchar*) new GLchar[count+1];
00049         file.read((char*)shaderCode, count);
00050         
00051         file.close();
00052         
00053         /*std::clog<<"SHADER"<<handle<<":\n"<<
00054         "---------------------------------------------\n"<<
00055         shaderCode<<"\n";//*/
00056         
00057         std::string temp;
00058         glShaderSource(handle, 1, (const GLchar**)&shaderCode, NULL);
00059         int error = glGetError();
00060         if(error != GL_NO_ERROR) 
00061         {
00062                 if(shaderType == GL_VERTEX_SHADER)
00063                         temp = "vertex";
00064                 if(shaderType == GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER)
00065                         temp = "fragment";
00066                 std::clog<<"Shader fuck up:"<<handle<<" type "<<temp<<" with error code "<<error<<"\n";
00067         }
00068         
00069         compile();
00070         if(!isCompiled())
00071         {
00072                 std::clog<<"shader not compiled:"<<filename<<"\n";
00073                 string log;
00074                 getShaderLog(log);
00075                 std::clog<<"Shader Log:\n"<<log<<"\n";
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void glslShader::compile()
00080 {
00081         glGetError();//clear
00082         if(!isCompiled())
00083         {
00084                 glCompileShader(handle);
00085                 GLuint error = glGetError();
00086                 if(error != GL_NO_ERROR) 
00087                 {
00088                         std::clog<<"Shader fuck up:compile: "<<error<<"\n";
00089                 }
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool glslShader::isCompiled() const
00094 {
00095         GLint compiled = 0;
00096         glGetShaderiv(handle, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &compiled);
00097         if(compiled == GL_TRUE)
00098                 return true;
00099         return false;
00100 }
00101 
00102 GLuint glslShader::getHandle() const
00103 {
00104         return handle;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void glslShader::getParameter(GLenum param, GLint *data) const
00108 {
00109         glGetShaderiv(handle, param, data);
00110 }
00111 
00112 void glslShader::getShaderLog(std::string &log) const
00113 {
00114         GLint length;
00115         
00116         glGetShaderiv(handle, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &length);
00117         glGetShaderInfoLog(handle, length+1, NULL, (GLchar*)log.c_str());
00118 }
00119 
00120 void glslShader::getShaderSource(std::string &shader) const
00121 {
00122         GLint length;
00123         
00124         glGetShaderiv(handle, GL_SHADER_SOURCE_LENGTH, &length);
00125         glGetShaderSource(handle, (GLsizei)length+1, NULL, (GLchar*)shader.c_str());
00126 }
00127 
00128 void glslShader::setShaderSource(std::string &code)
00129 {
00130         glShaderSource(handle, 1, (const GLchar**)&code, NULL);
00131 }
